post0.title: iOS Onboarding: Part One
post0.content: FirstTimeUser or Nah? . User Defaults . We can determine if a user is a first time user by setting boolean flags via UserDefaults, which Apple defines UserDefaults as: . An interface to the user’s defaults database, where you store key-value pairs persistently across launches of your app. . I find UserDefaults very useful for determine things like: . is a customer a first time user? | is a customer a beta tester? | .

post1.title: why blog?
post1.content: Intentions vs Goals . The road to failure is made easier by good intentions . I intend to write but experience has proven that intent is not a good motivator; I need to know why and how an action maps to a goal. . My current goals are: . stop googling around for solutions to the same problems | a single repository for documenting problems/solutions | a single repository for sharing and discussing ideas | . Writing address all 3. .

page1.title: About Me
page1.content: This page is a work in progress; it will be updated as I decide on what I think you ought to know about me. .
